mapper.select: select prc_cd, prc_nm, mng_unit, FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(mng_unit) as mngUnitNm, pdt_day, prc_sect FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(prc_sect) as prcSectNm, cmt, seq, use_yn from adm_prc_mng where use_yn='Y'
SELECT prc_cd, prc_nm, mng_unit, FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(mng_unit) as mngUnitNm, pdt_day, prc_sect, FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(prc_sect) as prcSectNm, cmt, seq, use_yn FROM adm_prc_mng order by seq
select dtl_nm as prcSectNm, dtl_cd as prcSect from adm_bas_dtl_cd where bas_cd = 'PDT_PRC'
select dtl_nm as mngUnitNm, dtl_cd as mngUnit from adm_bas_dtl_cd where bas_cd = 'MTR_UNIT'
mapper.update: UPDATE adm_prc_mng SET prc_nm = #{prcNm}, mng_unit = #{mngUnit}, pdt_day = #{pdtDay}, prc_sect = #{prcSect}, cmt = #{cmt}, seq = #{seq}, use_yn = #{useYn} WHERE prc_cd = #{prcCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adm_prc_mng (prc_cd, prc_nm, mng_unit, pdt_day, prc_sect, cmt, seq, use_yn) VALUES( #{prcCd}, #{prcNm}, #{mngUnit}, #{pdtDay}, #{prcSect}, #{cmt}, #{seq}, #{useYn} )
